title: Want a 72% GPU boost for free? AMD just delivered one — here’s how to get it
description: AMD has just made a change to its drivers that resulted in a massive performance boost, and you can benefit from it, too.

title: North Korean hackers create fake job offers to steal important data
description: Microsoft has found that North Korea-based hackers have been using various software and creating fake jobs to carry out malicious cyberattacks.

title: This dangerous hacking tool is now on the loose, and the consequences could be huge
description: A dangerous hacking tool has just been cracked and is now spreading quickly, potentially putting countless people at risk.

title: Intel reveals full Arc Alchemist pricing, and it’s definitely competitive
description: Intel has unveiled the official pricing and specs for the two top Arc Alchemist GPUs, the Arc A770 and the Arc A750.
